widgets.name: AW_AppBarIconTitleIcon
widgets.description: The AW_AppBarIconTitleIcon is a highly customizable AppBar widget that allows for a variety of modifications including the title, leading icon, action widget, and more. It provides flexibility in design with options for centering the title, changing the background color, adding a bottom widget, and even replacing the title or leading icon with custom widgets.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Title text to display in the app bar.

parameters.name: implyLeading
parameters.description: Whether to automatically show a leading icon (e.g., back arrow).

parameters.name: implyAction
parameters.description: Whether to automatically show an action icon (e.g., settings).

parameters.name: centerTitle
parameters.description: Whether to center the title text.

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: Background color of the app bar.

parameters.name: titleColor
parameters.description: Color of the title text.

parameters.name: onActionPressed
parameters.description: Callback function to be executed when the action icon is pressed.

parameters.name: onLeadingPressed
parameters.description: Callback function to be executed when the leading icon is pressed.

parameters.name: leadingIcon
parameters.description: Optional leading icon data (e.g., for back arrow).

parameters.name: actionWidget
parameters.description: Optional custom widget to use as the action icon.

parameters.name: actionKey
parameters.description: Optional key for the action widget.

parameters.name: leadingIconColor
parameters.description: Color of the leading icon.

parameters.name: arrowLeftMargin
parameters.description: Left margin for the leading icon.

parameters.name: leadingWidth
parameters.description: Optional width of the leading icon.

parameters.name: bottomWidget
parameters.description: Optional widget to display below the app bar content.

parameters.name: shape
parameters.description: Optional shape border for the app bar.

parameters.name: titleWidget
parameters.description: Optional widget to replace the title text.

parameters.name: leadingWidget
parameters.description: Optional widget to replace the leading icon.

parameters.name: useTheme
parameters.description: Whether to use the current theme for styling.

parameters.name: elevation
parameters.description: Elevation shadow of the app bar.

parameters.name: shadowColor
parameters.description: Color of the elevation shadow.

widgets.name: AW_AppBarIconLogoImage
widgets.description: The AW_AppBarIconLogoImage is a customizable AppBar widget that includes a leading icon, a logo, and a profile image. It provides options for user interaction through various onTap functions, and allows for a high degree of visual customization with options for background color, leading icon color, and the ability to add additional action widgets.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The build context.

parameters.name: logo
parameters.description: The logo of the app bar.

parameters.name: profileImage
parameters.description: The profile image to display.

parameters.name: leadingIcon
parameters.description: The icon to display on the leading.

parameters.name: onLeadingPressed
parameters.description: The function to call when the leading icon is pressed.

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: The background color of the app bar.

parameters.name: leadingColor
parameters.description: The color of the leading icon.

parameters.name: widgetKey
parameters.description: The widget key.

parameters.name: leadingKey
parameters.description: The key for the leading icon.

parameters.name: profileImageKey
parameters.description: The key for the profile image.

parameters.name: userInitials
parameters.description: The initials of the user.

parameters.name: onProfileImgTap
parameters.description: The function to call when the profile image is tapped.

parameters.name: actionWidget
parameters.description: The list of action widgets.

parameters.name: onActionTap
parameters.description: The function to call when an action widget is tapped.

parameters.name: onBatteryTap
parameters.description: The function to call when the battery icon is tapped.

parameters.name: isOnlyProfileImg
parameters.description: Whether to only show the profile image.

widgets.name: AW_VerticalWidgetsAppBar
widgets.description: This is a AW_VerticalWidgetsAppBar with a vertical widgets app bar. It has several parameters that can be customized.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The build context.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The widget key.

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: The background color of the app bar.

parameters.name: titleColor
parameters.description: The color of the title.

parameters.name: onLeadingPressed
parameters.description: The function to call when the leading icon is pressed.

parameters.name: actions
parameters.description: The list of action widgets.

parameters.name: leadingIcon
parameters.description: The icon to display on the leading.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the app bar.

parameters.name: bottomWidget
parameters.description: The widget to display at the bottom of the app bar.

parameters.name: centerTitle
parameters.description: Whether to center the title.

parameters.name: elevation
parameters.description: The elevation of the app bar.

widgets.name: AW_IconImageTextIconAlignLeftAppBar
widgets.description: The AW_IconImageTextIconAlignLeftAppBar is a customizable AppBar widget that features a leading icon, title text, and a right icon, with an optional circular image between the leading icon and the title. It provides a high degree of customization, including control over the background color, title text style, elevation, and the ability to specify custom functions for the leading icon and right icon’s onPressed events.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The build context.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The widget key.

parameters.name: onBack
parameters.description: The function to call when the back button is pressed.

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: The background color of the app bar.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the app bar.

parameters.name: onDelete
parameters.description: The function to call when the delete button is pressed.

parameters.name: shouldShowImage
parameters.description: Whether to show the image.

parameters.name: imageUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the image to display.

parameters.name: titleTextStyle
parameters.description: The text style of the title.

parameters.name: rightIcon
parameters.description: The icon to display on the right.

parameters.name: leadingIcon
parameters.description: The icon to display on the leading.

parameters.name: elevation
parameters.description: The elevation of the app bar.

parameters.name: useCached
parameters.description: Whether to use cached network image.

widgets.name: AW_AlertCard
widgets.description: A custom StatelessWidget that displays an alert card with an icon, title, and status. The card has a customizable color and can optionally display the title text.

parameters.name: widgetKey
parameters.description: A key that uniquely identifies this widget.

parameters.name: icon
parameters.description: The asset name of the icon to display.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title text to display.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status text to display.

parameters.name: statusColor
parameters.description: The color of the status text. Defaults to a shade of blue.

parameters.name: statusColorContainer
parameters.description: The color of the status text container. Defaults to a lighter shade of blue.

parameters.name: shouldSHowTitleText
parameters.description: A flag that determines whether the title text should be displayed. Defaults to false.

widgets.name: AW_CustomBadge
widgets.description: A custom StatelessWidget that displays a badge with an image and a footer text. The badge has a customizable color, size, and appearance, and it can show an animation.

parameters.name: animation
parameters.description: A flag that determines whether the badge should show an animation.

parameters.name: hasTitle
parameters.description: A flag that determines whether the badge should display the title text.

parameters.name: isUnlocked
parameters.description: A flag that determines whether the badge is unlocked.

parameters.name: backgroundWidth
parameters.description: The width of the badge's background.

parameters.name: lineWidth
parameters.description: The width of the badge's line.

parameters.name: percent
parameters.description: The percentage of the badge's progress.

parameters.name: radiusImage
parameters.description: The radius of the badge's image.

parameters.name: circularRadius
parameters.description: The radius of the badge's circular shape.

parameters.name: fontSize
parameters.description: The font size of the badge's text.

parameters.name: progressColor
parameters.description: The color of the badge's progress indicator.

parameters.name: footerText
parameters.description: The footer text to display on the badge.

parameters.name: imageUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the image to display on the badge.

parameters.name: lockedImage
parameters.description: The URL of the image to display when the badge is locked.

parameters.name: widgetKey
parameters.description: A key that uniquely identifies this widget.

parameters.name: maxLines
parameters.description: The maximum number of lines for the badge's text.

parameters.name: footerStyle
parameters.description: The text style of the badge's footer.

parameters.name: innerPadding
parameters.description: The inner padding of the badge.

parameters.name: titleSpacing
parameters.description: The spacing between the title and the badge.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of the badge.

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: The background color of the badge.

parameters.name: sameRadiusOfImageAndProgress
parameters.description: A flag that determines whether the radius of the image and the progress indicator should be the same.

widgets.name: AW_BadgeBackground
widgets.description: The AW_BadgeBackground is a custom StatelessWidget that displays a badge with an image and a footer text. The badge has a customizable color, size, and appearance, and it can show an animation.The badge’s appearance, including its colors, line width, and radius, are all customizable. The badge can also show an animation, which is controlled by the animation property.This widget is highly customizable and can be adapted to fit a variety of use cases.

parameters.name: animation
parameters.description: A flag that determines whether the badge should show an animation.

parameters.name: hasTitle
parameters.description: A flag that determines whether the badge should display the title text.

parameters.name: isUnlocked
parameters.description: A flag that determines whether the badge is unlocked.

parameters.name: lineWidth
parameters.description: The width of the badge's line.

parameters.name: percent
parameters.description: The percentage of the badge's progress.

parameters.name: radiusImage
parameters.description: The radius of the badge's image.

parameters.name: fontSize
parameters.description: The font size of the badge's text.

parameters.name: progressColor
parameters.description: The color of the badge's progress indicator.

parameters.name: footerText
parameters.description: The footer text to display on the badge.

parameters.name: imageUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the image to display on the badge.

parameters.name: lockedImage
parameters.description: The URL of the image to display when the badge is locked.

parameters.name: widgetKey
parameters.description: A key that uniquely identifies this widget.

parameters.name: maxLines
parameters.description: The maximum number of lines for the badge's text.

parameters.name: footerStyle
parameters.description: The text style of the badge's footer.

parameters.name: innerPadding
parameters.description: The inner padding of the badge.

parameters.name: titleSpacing
parameters.description: The spacing between the title and the badge.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of the badge.

parameters.name: lockedBackgroundColor
parameters.description: The background color of the badge when it is locked.

parameters.name: unlockedBackgroundColor
parameters.description: The background color of the badge when it is unlocked.

parameters.name: spaceAround
parameters.description: A flag that determines whether the badge should have space around it.

parameters.name: badgeOnly
parameters.description: A flag that determines whether only the badge should be displayed.

widgets.name: AW_IconTextBanner
widgets.description: A custom StatelessWidget that displays a banner with an icon and a title. The banner has a customizable color, text style, and appearance. It can also handle tap events.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title text to display on the banner.

parameters.name: icon
parameters.description: The icon to display on the banner.

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: The background color of the banner.

parameters.name: textColor
parameters.description: The color of the banner's text.

parameters.name: iconColor
parameters.description: The color of the banner's icon.

parameters.name: textStyle
parameters.description: The text style of the banner's text.

parameters.name: widgetKey
parameters.description: A key that uniquely identifies this widget.

parameters.name: onTap
parameters.description: A callback that is called when the banner is tapped.

widgets.name: AW_BluetoothState
widgets.description: A stateless widget that displays the Bluetooth state. It shows an image and a colored dot based on the Bluetooth state. The widget is clickable and can trigger a function on tap.

parameters.name: widgetKey
parameters.description: A key that uniquely identifies this widget.

parameters.name: bluetoothImage
parameters.description: The path to the Bluetooth image asset.

parameters.name: bluetoothState
parameters.description: The current state of the Bluetooth connection. It can be one of the following: notPaired, pairedAndInRange, pairedAndNotInRange, bluetoothDisabled.

parameters.name: onTap
parameters.description: A function that is triggered when the widget is tapped.

widgets.name: AW_BoostWidget
widgets.description: A stateless widget that displays a boost status and details. It shows a title, description, icon, and more icon. The widget is clickable and can trigger a function on tap. It also has styles and colors that can be customized.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the boost.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the boost.

parameters.name: icon
parameters.description: The icon of the boost.

parameters.name: moreIcon
parameters.description: The more icon of the boost.

parameters.name: isActive
parameters.description: The active status of the boost.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: The label of the boost.

parameters.name: dayLabel
parameters.description: The day label of the boost.

parameters.name: detailsIcon
parameters.description: The details icon of the boost.

parameters.name: onTap
parameters.description: The function to be called when the boost is tapped.

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: The background color of the boost.

parameters.name: activeColor
parameters.description: The active color of the boost.

parameters.name: stoppedColor
parameters.description: The stopped color of the boost.

parameters.name: titleStyle
parameters.description: The style of the title text.

parameters.name: descriptionStyle
parameters.description: The style of the description text.

parameters.name: labelStyle
parameters.description: The style of the label text.

widgets.name: AW_BottomNavigationPage
widgets.description: A stateful widget that displays a bottom navigation bar. It allows customization of selected and unselected item colors, items, visibility of title, background color, type of navigation bar, initial selection, visibility of unselected label, inner padding, elevation, visibility of bar, and event trackers. It also accepts a function to handle the 'pop' event.

parameters.name: selectedItemColor
parameters.description: The color of the selected item in the bottom navigation bar.

parameters.name: unSelectedItemColor
parameters.description: The color of the unselected item in the bottom navigation bar.

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: The items to be displayed in the bottom navigation bar.

parameters.name: widgetKey
parameters.description: A key that uniquely identifies this widget.

parameters.name: showTitle
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to show the title.

parameters.name: logEvent
parameters.description: A function to handle the log event.

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: The background color of the bottom navigation bar.

parameters.name: bottomNavigationBarType
parameters.description: The type of the bottom navigation bar.

parameters.name: showTitleFromSide
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to show the title from the side.

parameters.name: initialSelection
parameters.description: The initial selection of the bottom navigation bar.

parameters.name: showUnselectedLabel
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to show the unselected label.

parameters.name: innerPadding
parameters.description: The inner padding of the bottom navigation bar.

parameters.name: elevation
parameters.description: The elevation of the bottom navigation bar.

parameters.name: onPop
parameters.description: A function to handle the 'pop' event.

parameters.name: barVisible
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether the bar is visible.

parameters.name: eventTrackers
parameters.description: The event trackers of the bottom navigation bar.

widgets.name: AW_Button
widgets.description: A stateless widget that displays a button with customizable styles, colors, and behaviors. The button can be disabled, and its appearance can be customized using a ButtonStyle. The button also has a title, which can be styled using a TextStyle. The button can have a gradient background, which can be forced to override the default style. The button also has a width, a minimum width, and padding.

parameters.name: buttonTitle
parameters.description: The title of the button.

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether the button is disabled.

parameters.name: onPressed
parameters.description: The function to be called when the button is pressed.

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: The style of the button.

parameters.name: btnTitleStyle
parameters.description: The style of the button's title.

parameters.name: padding
parameters.description: The padding of the button.

parameters.name: forceStyleOverGradient
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to force the style over the gradient.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of the button.

parameters.name: minWidth
parameters.description: The minimum width of the button.

widgets.name: AW_ButtonWithImageBg
widgets.description: A stateless widget that displays a button with an image background. The button can be disabled, and its appearance can be customized using a TextStyle and a Color. The button also has a title, which can be styled using a TextStyle. The button also has a height, a button color, and two DecorationImage parameters for the enabled and disabled states.

parameters.name: buttonTitle
parameters.description: The title of the button.

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether the button is disabled.

parameters.name: onPressed
parameters.description: The function to be called when the button is pressed.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the button.

parameters.name: buttonTextStyle
parameters.description: The style of the button's title.

parameters.name: buttonColor
parameters.description: The color of the button.

parameters.name: boxDecorationImage
parameters.description: The decoration image that contains the SVG asset path and size for the enabled state.

parameters.name: disabledBoxDecorationImage
parameters.description: The decoration image that contains the SVG asset path and size for the disabled state.

widgets.name: AW_CustomCardItem
widgets.description: A stateless widget that displays a custom card item with an image and a title. The card has customizable width, image, title, maximum lines for the title, image border radius, image height, bottom radius, and box fit.

parameters.name: widgetKey
parameters.description: A key that uniquely identifies this widget.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the card.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: The image of the card.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of the card.

parameters.name: imageBorderRadius
parameters.description: The border radius of the image.

parameters.name: maxLines
parameters.description: The maximum number of lines for the title.

parameters.name: imageHeight
parameters.description: The height of the image.

parameters.name: bottomRadius
parameters.description: The bottom radius of the card.

parameters.name: boxFit
parameters.description: How to inscribe the image into the box.

widgets.name: AW_ChallengeItemCardDemo
widgets.description: A stateless widget that displays a challenge item card with an image, texts, and various flags. The card has customizable height, image radius, and several required parameters such as image, newChallengeText, challengeTitle, joinChallengeText, isJoinable, isExpired, teamNames, teamValues, hasTeam, team, withoutTeamBannerText, challengeExpired, assetPath, teamLabel, and isNewChallenge.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: The image of the challenge item card.

parameters.name: newChallengeText
parameters.description: The new challenge text of the challenge item card.

parameters.name: challengeTitle
parameters.description: The title of the challenge.

parameters.name: joinChallengeText
parameters.description: The join challenge text of the challenge item card.

parameters.name: isJoinable
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether the challenge is joinable.

parameters.name: isExpired
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether the challenge is expired.

parameters.name: teamNames
parameters.description: The team names of the challenge.

parameters.name: teamValues
parameters.description: The team values of the challenge.

parameters.name: hasTeam
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether the challenge has a team.

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: The team of the challenge.

parameters.name: withoutTeamBannerText
parameters.description: The without team banner text of the challenge item card.

parameters.name: challengeExpired
parameters.description: The challenge expired text of the challenge item card.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the challenge item card.

parameters.name: imageRadius
parameters.description: The image radius of the challenge item card.

parameters.name: assetPath
parameters.description: The asset path of the challenge item card.

parameters.name: teamLabel
parameters.description: The team label of the challenge item card.

parameters.name: isNewChallenge
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether it is a new challenge.

widgets.name: TeamsParticipantsDays
widgets.description: A stateless widget that displays a row of items with images, titles, and subtitles. The row has customizable padding, height, alignment, colors, subtitle style, visibility flags, and main axis alignment.

parameters.name: subtitle1
parameters.description: The subtitle of the first item.

parameters.name: title1
parameters.description: The title of the first item.

parameters.name: image1
parameters.description: The image of the first item.

parameters.name: image2
parameters.description: The image of the second item.

parameters.name: image3
parameters.description: The image of the third item.

parameters.name: subtitle2
parameters.description: The subtitle of the second item.

parameters.name: subtitle3
parameters.description: The subtitle of the third item.

parameters.name: title2
parameters.description: The title of the second item.

parameters.name: title3
parameters.description: The title of the third item.

parameters.name: padding
parameters.description: The padding of the row.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the row.

parameters.name: alignment
parameters.description: The alignment of the row in the cross axis.

parameters.name: color1
parameters.description: The color of the first item.

parameters.name: color2
parameters.description: The color of the second item.

parameters.name: color3
parameters.description: The color of the third item.

parameters.name: subtitleStyle
parameters.description: The style of the subtitles.

parameters.name: hide1
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to hide the first item.

parameters.name: hide2
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to hide the second item.

parameters.name: hide3
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to hide the third item.

parameters.name: mainAxisAlignment
parameters.description: The alignment of the row in the main axis.

widgets.name: AW_CustomProgressIndicator
widgets.description: A custom progress indicator widget that extends StatelessWidget. It uses the SfRadialGauge widget to create a radial gauge that can be customized with various parameters.

parameters.name: minValue
parameters.description: The minimum value of the radial gauge. Default is 0.

parameters.name: maxValue
parameters.description: The maximum value of the radial gauge. Default is 5.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The current value of the radial gauge. Default is 1.

parameters.name: lineColor
parameters.description: The color of the line in the radial gauge. Can be null.

parameters.name: lineWidth
parameters.description: The width of the line in the radial gauge. Default is 0.05.

parameters.name: bgColor
parameters.description: The background color of the radial gauge. Can be null.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The content widget inside the radial gauge. Can be null.

parameters.name: contentPadding
parameters.description: The padding for the content widget. Default is 0.

parameters.name: startAngle
parameters.description: The start angle of the radial gauge. Default is 125.

parameters.name: endAngle
parameters.description: The end angle of the radial gauge. Default is 55.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the widget. Default is 150.

parameters.name: widgetKey
parameters.description: The key for the widget. Can be null.

widgets.name: AW_CustomIntervalProgressIndicator
widgets.description: A custom widget that displays a radial gauge with a range pointer and a content widget in the center. The gauge can be customized with various colors, angles, thicknesses, and intervals.

parameters.name: minValue
parameters.description: The minimum value of the gauge. Defaults to 0.

parameters.name: maxValue
parameters.description: The maximum value of the gauge. Defaults to 5.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The interval between the major ticks of the gauge. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The current value of the range pointer. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: lineColor
parameters.description: The color of the range pointer. If null, defaults to Colors.blue.

parameters.name: lineWidth
parameters.description: The thickness of the range pointer and the axis line. Defaults to 0.05.

parameters.name: bgColor
parameters.description: The color of the axis line. If null, defaults to Colors.white.

parameters.name: betweenColor
parameters.description: The color of the segments between the major ticks. If null, defaults to Colors.white.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The widget to display in the center of the gauge. If null, no widget is displayed.

parameters.name: contentPadding
parameters.description: The padding between the content widget and the axis line. Defaults to 0.

parameters.name: startAngle
parameters.description: The start angle of the gauge in degrees. Defaults to 125.

parameters.name: endAngle
parameters.description: The end angle of the gauge in degrees. Defaults to 55.

parameters.name: majorThickness
parameters.description: The thickness of the major ticks in pixels. Defaults to 6.

parameters.name: separationLines
parameters.description: Whether to show the segments between the major ticks. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: widgetKey
parameters.description: The key to assign to the widget. If null, no key is assigned.

parameters.name: isInversed
parameters.description: Whether to inverse the direction of the gauge. Defaults to false.

widgets.name: AW_ConsentsListItem
widgets.description: A custom widget that displays a consent title with a toggle switch. The toggle switch can be switched between two states: accepted or declined. The widget can be customized with various colors, styles, and functions.

parameters.name: onToggle
parameters.description: The function to execute when the toggle switch is toggled. The function takes an integer as an argument, which represents the index of the selected state (0 for declined, 1 for accepted).

parameters.name: onTitleTap
parameters.description: The function to execute when the consent title is tapped. If null, no function is executed.

parameters.name: consentTitle
parameters.description: The text to display as the consent title. Defaults to an empty string.

parameters.name: isToggleSwitched
parameters.description: The initial state of the toggle switch. If null, no state is selected. If true, the accepted state is selected. If false, the declined state is selected.

parameters.name: activeBgColor
parameters.description: The background color of the toggle switch when the accepted state is selected. Defaults to Color.fromRGBO(23, 72, 213, 1).

parameters.name: declinedBgColor
parameters.description: The background color of the toggle switch when the declined state is selected. Defaults to Colors.red.

parameters.name: widgetKey
parameters.description: The key to assign to the widget. If null, no key is assigned.

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: The text style to apply to the consent title. Defaults to TextStyle(decoration: TextDecoration.underline).

parameters.name: changeOnTap
parameters.description: Whether to change the state of the toggle switch when the consent title is tapped. Defaults to true.

widgets.name: AW_DiscountSquareWidget
widgets.description: A custom widget that displays a title and three square widgets with different discounts. The discounts can be either percentages or fixed amounts. The widget can be customized with various colors, keys, and styles. The widget can also have an empty state if the discounts are zero.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The text to display as the title of the widget. If null, no title is displayed.

parameters.name: topLeftNumber
parameters.description: The discount to display in the top left square widget. If null or zero, the square widget is empty.

parameters.name: topRightNumber
parameters.description: The discount to display in the top right square widget. If null or zero, the square widget is empty.

parameters.name: widgetKey
parameters.description: The key to assign to the widget. If null, no key is assigned.

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: The price to display in the bottom square widget. If empty, '...' is displayed. Defaults to '...'.

parameters.name: activeBgColor
parameters.description: The background color of the square widgets when they are active (have a non-zero discount). Defaults to Color.fromRGBO(6, 62, 89, 1).

parameters.name: declinedBgColor
parameters.description: The background color of the square widgets when they are declined (have a zero discount). Defaults to Color.fromRGBO(127, 144, 159, 1).

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: The text style to apply to the title of the widget. Defaults to TextStyle(decoration: TextDecoration.underline).

widgets.name: AW_DotContainerWithStates
widgets.description: A widget that displays a container with a dot. The dot can have different states, represented by the `DotType` enum. The dot can be a full dot, an empty dot, or a dot with a ring. The color of the dot and whether it is active or not can also be specified.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the dot. It can be `fullDot`, `emptyDot`, or `dotWithRing`.

parameters.name: widgetKey
parameters.description: The key for the widget. It can be used to control or determine some aspect of the widget's behavior.

parameters.name: dotColor
parameters.description: The color of the dot. The default color is black.

parameters.name: isNotActiveAncCurrent
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether the dot is not active and current. The default value is `false`.

widgets.name: AW_ChallengeCardJapan
widgets.description: A widget that displays a challenge card with various properties. It can show an info icon, display text, show a button on the right corner, and more. It also has properties for action, center, and leading icons and titles, as well as values. The card can be tapped, and it can display a widget at the bottom left.

parameters.name: infoIconColor
parameters.description: The color of the info icon. The default color is a shade of blue.

parameters.name: infoTextStyle
parameters.description: The style of the info text. The default style has a font size of 12.

parameters.name: showRightCornerBtn
parameters.description: Whether to show a button on the right corner. The default value is true.

parameters.name: rightCornerBtnStyle
parameters.description: The style of the right corner button.

parameters.name: btnDisabled
parameters.description: Whether the button is disabled. The default value is false.

parameters.name: isParticipating
parameters.description: Whether the user is participating. The default value is false.

parameters.name: rightCornerBtnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called when the right corner button is pressed.

parameters.name: rightCornerBtnText
parameters.description: The text of the right corner button. The default text is 'Join'.

parameters.name: infoText
parameters.description: The info text. The default text is 'Sample text'.

parameters.name: leftBottomWidget
parameters.description: The widget to be displayed at the bottom left.

parameters.name: cardTap
parameters.description: The function to be called when the card is tapped.

parameters.name: actionIcon
parameters.description: The icon for the action. The default icon is an empty string.

parameters.name: actionTitle
parameters.description: The title for the action. The default title is 'title'.

parameters.name: actionValue
parameters.description: The value for the action. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: centerIcon
parameters.description: The icon for the center. The default icon is an empty string.

parameters.name: centerTitle
parameters.description: The title for the center. The default title is 'title'.

parameters.name: centerValue
parameters.description: The value for the center. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: leadingIcon
parameters.description: The icon for the leading. The default icon is an empty string.

parameters.name: leadingTitle
parameters.description: The title for the leading. The default title is 'title'.

parameters.name: leadingValue
parameters.description: The value for the leading. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: titleStyle
parameters.description: The style of the title. The default style has a font size of 16, a weight of 700, and a color of blue.

parameters.name: titleBottomStyle
parameters.description: The style of the bottom title. The default style has a font size of 13, a weight of 400, and a color of black.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title. The default title is 'Sample title'.

parameters.name: iconColor
parameters.description: The color of the icon. The default color is a shade of blue.

parameters.name: bottomRightTitle
parameters.description: The title at the bottom right. The default title is 'Sample title'.

parameters.name: bottomRightTitleStyle
parameters.description: The style of the title at the bottom right. The default style has a font size of 11.

parameters.name: bottomRightValue
parameters.description: The value at the bottom right. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: userTeamName
parameters.description: The name of the user's team. The default name is an empty string.

parameters.name: challengeTeamNumber
parameters.description: The number of the challenge team. The default number is 1.

parameters.name: downLeftWidget
parameters.description: The widget to be displayed at the bottom left. This parameter is required.

parameters.name: isJapan
parameters.description: Whether the card is for Japan. The default value is false.

widgets.name: AW_ChallengeItemImage
widgets.description: A widget that displays an image for a challenge item. It includes a title, subtitle, and a join button. The image, title, subtitle, and button title can be customized. The button can also be hidden.

parameters.name: widgetKey
parameters.description: The key for the widget. It can be used to control or determine some aspect of the widget's behavior.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: The URL of the image to display. The default is an empty string.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title to display. The default is an empty string.

parameters.name: subtitle
parameters.description: The subtitle to display. The default is an empty string.

parameters.name: showJoinButton
parameters.description: Whether to show the join button. The default is true.

parameters.name: buttonTitle
parameters.description: The title of the join button. The default is an empty string.

parameters.name: onButtonPressed
parameters.description: The function to be called when the join button is pressed.

widgets.name: AW_CheckboxText
widgets.description: A stateful widget that displays a checkbox with text. The checkbox can be active or inactive, and its color can be customized. The text can be plain or rich text. The widget also has an onChange function that is called when the checkbox is toggled.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key for the widget. It can be used to control or determine some aspect of the widget's behavior.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to display next to the checkbox. This parameter is required.

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: Whether the checkbox is disabled. This parameter is required.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: The new value of the checkbox. This parameter is required.

parameters.name: onChange
parameters.description: The function to be called when the checkbox is toggled. This parameter is required.

parameters.name: checkBoxIconColor
parameters.description: The color of the checkbox icon. The default color is blue.

parameters.name: inActiveCheckBoxBgColor
parameters.description: The background color of the checkbox when it is inactive. The default color is white.

parameters.name: activeCheckBoxBgColor
parameters.description: The background color of the checkbox when it is active.

parameters.name: textColor
parameters.description: The color of the text. The default color is black.

parameters.name: shouldUseRichTest
parameters.description: Whether to use rich text. The default value is false.

parameters.name: otherText
parameters.description: Other text to display. The default text is an empty string.

parameters.name: richText
parameters.description: The rich text to display. The default text is an empty string.
